sales representatives brief sales history for Brief Sales History by Sales Rep
section.para: To view brief Sales history by Sales Representative, select the "Brief Sales History by Sales Rep" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Brief Sales History by Sales Representative

section.para: When displaying brief Sales history by Sales Representative, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Sales Representative whose brief sales history you want to display.
Select to display brief Sales history by Sales Representative for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose brief Sales history by Sales Representative you want to display.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display brief Sales history by Sales Representative for all Sites.
Specify Site whose brief Sales history by Sales Representative you want to display.
Brief Sales history by Sales Representative generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Brief Sales history by Sales Representative generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Select to include Costs in the display.
Select to include Prices in the display.
Display lists brief Sales history by Sales Representative, using the specified parameters. Prices are normalized to the Base Currency using the Currency Exchange Rate effective on the Invoice Date.
